attributes.action: Make it manditory for each home to have at least 1 recycling bin
attributes.additional_details: Beacuse it damages the environment and i dont think it would cost much to have just 1 recycling bin in each home
attributes.background: I would like to have 1 recycling bin for each home due to many homes not having 1 causing damage to our enviroment

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Councils are already legally obliged to provide certain recycling collections.
                
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
